sections.heading: Employment of nursing personnel by county commissioners.
sections.text:
34-4-5. Employment of nursing personnel by county commissioners.

The board of county commissioners of any county may at any time when in their judgment and discretion the public health and interests of such county will be benefited thereby, employ nursing personnel as defined in chapter 36-9.

Source:SL 1919, ch 149, ยง4; SDC 1939, ยง27.2004; SL 1978, ch 245, ยง2.
